backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products, purchases, sessions, and access control with initialization helpers and comparison modules.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing feature changes, involved files, components, and test IDs for frontend updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component routing users to login, shop, or admin pages with themed layout.
frontend/src/components/Banner.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a banner component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, branding, and a caffeine.ai link with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app title, username, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product image, price, and status with a selectable button and sold‑out overlay.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseDialog.t: Dialog for viewing product details and submitting purchase requests with error handling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Wrapper enabling system-based theme switching via next-themes.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Empty placeholder file for a user profile setup component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and triggering query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomAuth.ts: Zustand store managing simple username-based auth with persistence and allowed-user validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for login, profiles, admin checks, and product operations with caching and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme tokens and ensuring consistent UI component backgrounds.
frontend/src/lib/productImage.ts: Utility resolving product image sources, preferring embedded data URLs and otherwise returning null.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing purchases and products, including creation, deletion, and image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Username-based login screen validating allowed users and syncing backend and local auth states.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Renders the shop page with tabs for normal and free products, fetching items by category and opening a purchase dialog on selection. Auto-refetches lists when the dialog closes and displays loading and empty states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, and fonts with CSS variable–driven theming and enabling animation and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and feature requirements for the shop app.
